verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}From the ends of the earth (echo) From the depths of the sea (echo) From the heights of the heavens (echo) Your name we praise (all){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}From the hearts of the weak (echo) From the shouts of the strong (echo) From the lips of all people (echo) This song we raise (all){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Throughout the endless ages You will be crowned with praises, Lord Most High Exalted in every nation, Sovereign of all creation Lord Most High, be magnified.{/lang-eng}
